mdRecord.dcterms:title: Geburts- und Tauf-Schein
Ich bin getauft, ich steh' im Bunde
Wann wir kaum geboren werden
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Blumer, Busch und Ce. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Title at top of sheet, with an eagle holding a banner centered between "Geburts- und" and "Tauf-Schein." The birth certificate is in a small ornamented panel below; an angel stands on either side of the certificate. Text [1st line: Wann wir kaum geboren werden] within two ornamental blocks on either side of the eagle. Another text block [1st line: Ich bin getauft, ich steh' im Bunde] centered below the birth certificate, has birds on either side. A border of type ornaments surrounds all. [original]

Birth certificate is for Earl Moll, b. Sept. 17, 1849 to Jonas and Sophia Moll, in Milfort (?), Township, Berks (?) County, Pennsylvania. The infant was baptised on Nov. 11, 1849 by Pastor F. Wake. Godparents were Daniel Vollmer and his wife Lidia, nee Hauskuger. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gift of Niklas von Schrenck. Transcription and translation by Angelika Powell is laid in folder. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gift of Niklas von Schrenck. Transcription and translation by Angelika Powell is laid in folder. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Birth certificates--Pennsylvania
Baptismal certificates--Pennsylvania
